nidasunak lesin, jorj woshintan anugami dhura wara dekak sewaya kala athara eya gananaya wanne palamu janadhipathi lesini (palamu ha dewana janadhipathi lesin nowe). 37wana janadhipathi wu richad niksan illa aswima hamuwe, jerald fod pathwu wita ohu sidu kale niksange dewana dhura warayehi ithiri kala simawa thula sewaya kirima wana athara ohu kisi witeka janadhipathi dhurayata tharaga kota theri path nuwuwada ohu handinwune 38wana janadhipathi lesini.
ape deshiya waidya widyawa thula rudhiraya pirisidukara ganimata sudusu aushadha rasak pawathinawa.
ewakata janadhipathi barak obama balayata path karaganimen langa karaganimata apeksha kala wenasa yatharthayak wuye natha.

(krodha namathi) rahanada (thrushna namathi) warapatada anukrama sahithawu (desata misaditunamathi) maha damada (ee ee margayan) sinda (sitiyawu) (uduraharana lada awidya namathi) hindibawa athi (chathurarya sathyayan) awabodhakalawu ee kshinashrawaya mama brahmanayayi kiyami. 26-16 akkosa haradwaja pilibanda wu katha puwatha akkosan wadhabandhanycha, adutto yo thithikkhathi; khanthibalan balanikan, thamahan brumi brahmanan.

digu kalak thisse eestrajan homonaya adhikawa labima nisa pirimiyekuge sirure purushabawata adala dwithiyika lingika lakshana sampurnayenma pahe gilihi yayi.eewenuwata purusha sirura sthri sirurak bawata path kirimata adala sthri dwithiyika lingika lakshana pahalawe.me thathwaya sharirikawa menma manasikawada athiwe.pirimiyeku sathuwa athi hadidadi purusha lakshana wenuwata sundara sukomala nari lalithyayak siruren prakatawe.kayikawa mana lesa wadunu sundara kanthawak bawata mebandu aya pathwe.purusha lingendriya thibunada,eya bohowita lingika lesa akarmanya swabhawaye pawathi.eya sirurata anawashya indriyak bawatada pathwe.
